LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_FlameLance.label: plasmalance
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_FlameLance.description:
A metal-cored lance with a cutting edge that is able to set enemies on fire. The lance is capable of firing an incendiary charge, breaking defensive lines and roasting bugs.
Its great weight requires the user to wear powered armor or similar apparel.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMonoSword.label: heavy monosword
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMonoSword.descripti:
A crystal-metallic heavy longsword infused with mechanites that maintain a mono-molecular cutting edge. It cuts through even thick armor with ease, and its fearsome shape intimidates foes.
Its great weight requires the user to wear powered armor or similar apparel.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_HeavyZeushammer.label: heavy zeushammer
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_HeavyZeushammer.descript: A heavy warhammer with an embedded EMP capacitor. Upon impact, it blasts the target with an EMP burst in addition to the physical damage. How did you get this ;)
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_PsychicWarhammer.label: Relic Maul
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_PsychicWarhammer.descrip:
An ultratech maul threaded with psychic focusing materials. A replica of the old legend, its main purpose is to enhance the wielder's psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, allowing more use of psychic powers.
Its great weight requires the user to wear powered armor or similar apparel.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_RocketHammer.label: rocket hammer
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_RocketHammer.description:
A heavy warhammer with an embedded thruster. Upon using, the thruster sends the pawn flying.
It's great weight requires the user to wear powered armor or similar apparel.
Every swing costs a bit of fuel so plan put your actions ahead of time.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_SagittariusMight.label: Sagittarius Might
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_SagittariusMight.descrip: A needlessly elaborate weapon of execution. The royal's preferred way of erasing internal opposition from existence. /n The artifact is one in a limited collection of singularity field generators since being banned in the glitter worlds. It can now only be found in the blackest markets. /n Despite it's name, the artifact has nowhere near the same power of a super massive black hole. Anyone holding it should excercise extreme caution nonetheless.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_SagittariusMight.modExte: Planting this weapon will make it detonate after 8 seconds.
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_ZeusSword.label: burst blade
LanguageData.HMW_MeleeWeapon_ZeusSword.description:
A crystal-metallic greatsword infused with mechanites that maintain a mono-molecular cutting edge. The sword has built-in EMP emmiters, shocking those unfortunate enough to be on the recieving end of it.
It cuts through even thick armor with ease, but its great weight requires the user to wear powered armor or similar apparel.
